title: Tesla 's net loss attributable to common stockholders 2013 to 2019
summary: In general Loss in million U.S. dollars has fallen over the Year.
Loss in million U.S. dollars is slightly decreasing from 2018 to 2019.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 2018 and 2019.
Maximum Loss in million U.S. dollars, about 976.0 was reported at Year 2018
The lowest Loss in million U.S. dollars, of value 862.0 was reported at Year 2019
